node_modules/pimatic-gpio/README.md

pimatic gpio plugin

Actuators and sensors for the raspberry pi gpio pins.

Configuration

You can load the plugin by editing your config.json to include:

{ 
   "plugin": "gpio"
}

in the plugins Array. For all configuration options see sispmctl-config-shema

Actuators can be added bei adding them to the actuators Array in the config file. Set the class attribute to GpioSwitch. For example:

{ 
  "id": "led-light",
  "class": "GpioSwitch", 
  "name": "led light",
  "gpio": 25 
}

For actuator configuration options see the actuator-config-shema file.

Sensors are added to the sensors Array.

{ 
  "id": "presents-sensor",
  "class": "GpioPresents", 
  "name": "motion detector",
  "gpio": 21 
}
